info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 27 at 1:50PM MDT until April 27 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 245 PM MDT.
* At 150 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located in the Roswell area.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported that the Roswell Relief Route is closed due to near zero visibility.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Roswell, Dexter, Hagerman, Bottomless Lakes State Park, Bitter Lake Wildlife Refuge, Lake Arthur, Roswell Correctional Facility, Midway and Greenfield.
This includes the following highways... Highway 380 between Mile Markers 156 and 166. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 79 and 118.
Near zero visibility is possible along the Roswell Relief route between Sunset and Brasher. Use an alternate route. Please avoid this area.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 2:45 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 2:45 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 2:45 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 2:45 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
